sectionNotes: Restricted to Statistics or Statistics & Computer Science major(s). Restricted to Undergrad - Urbana-Champaign.
sectionText: For up-to-date information about statistics course registration, please see our registration page: https://illinois.edu/blog/view/7118.  This course is restricted to students majoring in Statistics or Statistics & Computer Science. Instructor approval is required. Learn more and request approval here: go.illinois.edu/STAT427_Sec1 (Deadline to apply: November 7, 2016).
